entry.title: Purveyor of Fluff
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,976Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 105

Summary: You run the bath hotter than you should, knowing he won’t complain. After a long night, Bruce doesn’t need questions. He needs steam, silence, and someone who won’t flinch when he does.(Series of fluffy and comfy one-shots about the Gotham boys and you!)Requests are open. This is also my idea dump :)

entry.title: The House hunger built
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,678Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 20

Summary: "Of course I eat people, I mean...It's not something I would broadcast since it's...well Gotham and they began to make a phad about it because the citizens are brilliantly...stupid."Bodies are piling up, whatever is left. Families; different backgrounds, different ethnics, religions, looks are being eaten and whatever is left into a master piece. Some sort of art with the remains and everyone was losing time and leads to find out who has been feasting upon Gotham citizens. Jason however, knew of a Cannibal that he totally never mentioned to Bruce. It's not Jason's fault he died before revealing his darkest discovery and that discovery is in the form of a boy he had left behind. [M/N] [L/N]; Mortitan, brilliant, a chef of his own making and conisear of flesh.All Jason needed to do is sweeten the deal in a way that drives all people, after all at the end of the day {M/N] is human after all."Besides..it's people...they are literally born every day..so who cares if a few of them...just disapear once in a while?"

entry.title: The Way You See Me
entry.summary:
Author: Xivkyn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,275Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: After being an experiment to Hugo Strange for the majority of your life you finally escape. The trauma of your time there follows you as you remember the screams and death all around you. You don't even know your own name as the number 'Seven' was the only semblance of a name you were given. You have no one to go home to and nothing you look forward to except for revenge. It consumes your every thought ever since you escaped. You want him to feel the pain he caused you and your friends.Limited y/n usage

entry.title: Chromatic silence
entry.summary:
Author: corpsedogs

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,646Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 55

Summary: And then.. it happens. Your world explodes.Just a single brief touch. It didn’t even last a second, but that’s all it took.The color rushes in and you inhale sharply.Jason.. he was all red and shadows, his hoodie the deepest rust and his skin warm in the golden lamplight. You blink, nearly stumbling as you grab the railing like it’ll hold your sanity in place.But then you looked at Jason, staring at the distance like nothing happened.You internally panicked.He doesn’t see it.He doesn’t feel it. A.K.A The reader’s soulmate power is to see colors for the first time when she touches her soulmate. When she met Jason, her world bursts to color but not his. She fell for him quietly, but she’s not his and she’s torn between waiting for his colors to come or moving on.

entry.summary:
Author: Totallynotashieldagent

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,736Chapters: 31/31Kudos: 3,335

Summary: Jason had all but abandoned the idea of ever meeting his soulmate. He avoided being touched altogether.Reader had never cared for the idea of soulmates anyway. She was frivolous of it and didn't think she'd meet her soulmate in a place like Gotham.The universe had a different plan for both of them.Soulmate AU - The one where when soulmates make skin contact for the first time, their skin explodes into a million colours.Author's Note: This fic is "finished" at chapter 26 but every now and then, I upload a slice of life kind of chapter.

entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 100,086Chapters: 31/31Kudos: 943

Summary: “I’m looking for an application for a scholarship.”“You didn’t have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,” Tim deadpanned, “I wasn’t aware you could go to college if you’re legally dead.”His eye twitched. “I’m looking for an applicant,” he amended, “She already applied.”Tim finally looked at him. “She?”_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n

entry.title: The Star that Wouldn't Die
entry.summary:
Author: ShadDork

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,814Chapters: 9/25Kudos: 116

Summary: Jason Todd forgot a lot of things after the lazarus pit's putrid green waters helped restore him back to life. Most of it was unimportant information, things that he didn't need to worry about, after all, he could always relearn names, smells, and re-read books. Lost memories weren't as easy to deal with the loss of, but he could always make new ones. The memories that remained were largely traumatic, and the others were slowly being uncovered as time passed.He wished that Dick hadn't said that name, your name. Reigniting feelings and memories. Guilt was already a large part of his existence, and this new guilt about forgetting you entirely was just making everything worse. He shouldn't track you down in case it accidentally put you in danger. But he wanted to make sure that you were okay. It was a battle he lost against himself.As memories he thought were long lost start to return, can he continue to be in your life without dragging you down with him? Can he be in your life without you knowing who he is? He doesn't know, but he wants to try.

entry.title: I Can't Help But Wonder
entry.summary:
Author: Honey_Sugar_And_Spite

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,243Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Athena Pines, after having been left in Gotham by her Uncle Stan while he tries to figure out the portal to bring her father back, thrives, having been adopted by the local Bat after arresting her Uncle Stanley’s friend for being a Joker goon. Now 40, she gets a summons back from the very man that left her, telling her that the Shack, and subsequently, her father’s only way back, has been stolen by a tiny tyrant. Now she has to help anyway she can. With her husband Jason Todd, and siblings Cassandra Cain and Damien Wayne in tow. (Inspired by the song I Can’t Help But Wonder, from Epic! The Musical, where oc is Telemachus and Ford is Odysseus)

entry.title: Indigo
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,721Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 28

Summary: You had grown up in the deep south, middle of nowhere Clyde, Texas. Finally leaving after high school to university a few states away. It wasn't that you were itching to get away. You love your parents, the farm, taking care of the animals and crops. But you were excited to live a little, see the world outside of your town where you knew most the entire population by name.But when your parents both end up sick, both end up passing, you're forced to head home and figure out the future plans for the ranch. Sell it and turn your back on your childhood home? Live there and turn your back on your new life?
